body.name: 2 Pack Wireless Microphones for iPhone iPad, Professional Mics for Video Recording Interview Conference Podcast Vlog YouTube TikTok
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 23 mins
features: ✅【Lightweight & Clip-on Microphone】The professional lavalier microphone kit has 1 receiver and 2 transmitters included, which makes it possible to record sound or video from both 2 parties at the same time. Also we can use one mic and receiver set according to the occasion.

✅【Easy Connection, Plug & Play】The smart clip-on microphone is much easier to use than other microphones. Just plug the receiver into your devices and turn on the power switch of the transmitters, the two parts will get connected successfully and auto paired immediately. Then you can start to record voice or videos without opening extra app or bluetooth in your cellphone.(Note: Bluetooth wireless microphone, if the match is not successful, do not worry, just turn off the device and try again).

✅【Omnidirectional Sound & Noise Cancellation】Omnidirectional dual wireless lavalier microphone is built with professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips, providing effective identification of the original sound and clear recording in noisy environment. Ensure you get quality sound and a better experience.

✅【65ft Distance & 5H Battery Life】 This portable iPhone microphone is designed with 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology, which helps you get rid of messy wire and cover up to a 65ft stable signal transmission, this mini wireless lavalier microphone provide more than 5 hours of battery life and only 2 hours to get fully charged.

✅【Compatible with IOS Devices】The wireless tiny microphone is made for iPhone and iPad. Plug the usb microphone receiver into your iOS device to record video anytime. It will be very convenient for you to record on different social media platforms like YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Tik Tok etc. Bluetooth microphone not available for Android devices unless you have a proper adapter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Notes on using steps 1.Please make sure your device is unlocked and the receiver is plugged into the port of your smartphone. 2. Press the power switch of the microphone for about 1 second to turn it on. If the green light for both of receiver and transmitter always keeps on, it means they paired successfully. 3. Press the power switch of the microphone very softly, the green light will keep flashing, which means the recording was paused. By pressing the button again, it will stop flashing and the recording will continue. 4. Any time when you see the red light & green light flashes alternately, it means the connection is failed and you need to restart. 5. Press and hold the power switch for about 3 seconds to power off the microphone. 6. Special note: The receiver does not have a battery inside, and does not need to be charged during live broadcast. If the power of the mobile phone is insufficient during the live broadcast, the mobile phone can be charged directly through the interface of the receiving end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I actually really love these mics. They are really easy to use with an iPhone and are extremely nice for the price. They work well and the noise cancelling is good. It picks up sound well and also plays well. I started using these for a podcast I started recently and they've been a great way to easily start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works way better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: These microphones are very sensitive and hooked to my iPhone with ease. No pairing problems whatsoever. Audio quality is great. You can’t beat it for $10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was actually shocked at how well these worked for $10! I’m so happy that I got them! We do house tours and we also do random interview so we need some thing that they can hear us from far away and it works so well for a video is the only thing I’m sad about is I lost the receiver at a vacant house and I can’t find it and I’m hoping I can get a replacement from the company.Whatever you do, don’t be me, make sure you know where all of your pieces are!But it is definitely a plug and play item. All you do is plug in the receiver to your phone turn on the microphone and go about your business! Super easy to charge two with the USB. This is well worth the $10!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The microphone works fine. The charger that comes in the box “is too loose” for the microphone so that charger is unusable. To charge the mics I have to use a separate usb-c plug. The mics also die pretty fast so I do have to charge it a lot. Besides that I like how my voice sounds on it and the microphone quality is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical in getting such a great deal. Tested this product with two different tv in the same room playing two different programs at the same time. It did not pick up the noise while I talked with mic attacked. Did testing near mouth and attached to clothing. Slowly pulled the mic away from myself until arms length away is when I notice you could barely hear me and I have always been told that I speak soft naturally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 Iphones, and I tried both....neither microphone would pair. The green and red light just kept flashing. The book said 24hr available to contact for troubleshooting but no number or email anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: These are great, the audio is good and it’s great for the money. Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewerName: Great product! My daughter loves them, they are so soft! Will def buy again!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great! My son loves it! Great quality!
